# automatic

**Type Property**

A notation that automatically provides locale-appropriate behavior.

## Declaration

```swift
static var automatic: NumberFormatStyleConfiguration.Notation { get }
```

## Notations

- **compactName**: A locale-appropriate compact name notation.
- **scientific**: A notation constant that formats values with scientific notation.

items.description: A notation constant that formats values with scientific notation.
